name: LASER v.1.1.1 [MODES]
description:
"Why do the screenshots say 'coded and designed by ninjito?'"

I originally placed this game on https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/720970554/ where my username is ninjito and I made another version for https://itch.io.

Controls

  •  Tap/click the darker boxes along the edges of the grid to fire a laser horizontally or vertically.
  •  Hit the restart button in the top right corner to restart your game.

Instructions

  •  There is a color in the box above the grid that  will appear every time you successfully complete the previous color.
  •  To complete a color, fire a laser in a row or column that has that color.
  •  Gain as many points as you can in one minute!

Settings

  •  Particles 

Disable or enable special particle effects for when the laser fires. Helps with performance.

  •  Smooth Movement (COMING SOON)

Disable or enable smooth movement systems- helps with motion sickness and some performance.

  •  Music

Disable or enable music in the background.
